name: Hardika Enterprises
overview:
Established in the year 2002, we, “Hardika Enterprises”, are a trusted name engaged in trading, supplying and exporting a quality-assured gamut of Fume Scrubber, Centrifugal Fan.

Products & Services: Fume Scrubber, Centrifugal Fan, Air Washer, Dust Collector, Air Handling Unit, Axial Fan, Portable Fire Fighting Pump, Swimming Pool Cleaner, Sewage Line, Non Clog Sludge, Slimline Contractor Style and Dewatering Line.

Our Team: We have with us, an adroit team of professionals, which assist us in carrying our all the activities of our trade in a smooth and sophisticated manner.

Vendor Base: Over the years, we have mustered a rich vendor base. Our vendor base comprises top-notch manufacturers of various products. The efforts of our procuring agents help us in determining the competency of each vendor, prior to procuring the products. Vendors associated with us are highly cooperative. They meet our urgent demands and aid us in meeting the demands of our clients.

Our Quality: Ever since the time of inception, main aim of our organization has been to serve our clients with an excellentrange of Fume Scrubber, Centrifugal Fan, Air Washer, Dust Collector, Air Handling Unit, Axial Fan, Portable Fire Fighting Pump, Swimming Pool Cleaner and many more.

Client Satisfaction: Being a client-centric organization, our primary aim has always been to extend the contentment level of our patrons by offering them a quality-assured range of products.
